subject: RE: [junit] Running same tests again with different configuration..
msgSnippet: ... I think the original poster wanted to reuse the same test class and pass it different parameters, which would alter its behavior. Hence my suggestion of
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On

> In JUnit it would look like this
>
> public abstract class FooTest extends TestCase {
> public class FooImplTest extends FooTest {
> public class FooOtherImplTest extends FooTest {

I think the original poster wanted to reuse the same test class and pass it
different parameters, which would alter its behavior.

Hence my suggestion of the Strategy pattern.

--
